name: Scary Voice Changer – Ringtones and Sound.s Editor
name_original: Scary Voice Changer – Ringtones and Sound.s Editor
description:
Hello, everyone! Are you ready for another awesome app that you will like to have? If you want to have some hilarious time with your friends and family members, “Scary Voice Changer – Ringtones and Sound.s Editor” is the right choice for you! Download this entertaining app for kids and adults and always have fun! Find out how scary or funny you may sound! Change your voice and the voice of your friends in the easiest possible way!

- Tap to record voices for free and transform it!
- Add one of a wide range of scary sounds effects: ogre, witch, snake, alien etc!
- Additional custom voice changing!
- Record, easily edit, name and save your recording file
- Directly share them with your friends via all social networks!
- Turn the modified sounds into ringtones or SMS sounds!
- In-app purchases and the option to restore purchases!

If you live for fun moments spent with your friends and other important people in your life, this incredible free app for kids may just be something that perfectly fits you and your lifestyle. Just tap to record your voice and sounds for free and make fun of what you have recorded! Use the recorded sounds in a lot of fun ways and always live for laughter! And all that for free! Since the best things in life are for free, it is easy to realize that this entertaining app for teenagers is one of the best things you could ever have! You may even set your favorite recorded sounds as phone ringtones and always have a smile on your face when someone calls or texts you!

Don't hesitate to download this free fun app even today! Record your voice or the voice of your friends and then transform it with the help of the awesome sound effects. Have fun with every new incoming call or text message you receive! Live your dream life while doing things that make you happy!
